field.name: description
field.value:
I have a patch (which at the moment I can't quite see how to attach to this donjon issue) that adds support for nh 2.1's tuplizers. e.g.
[ActiveRecord(Tuplizer = typeof(MyTuplizer)]
What's the deal with 2.1 and the branches in svn? Do we need a new one?

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text:
The current trunk contains an older NH trunk revision with a patch by hammett. Tuna Toksöz is currently working on gettign that patch into NH trunk.
If we need a newer NH in trunk, we have to discuss with Hammett whether his patch is still necessary (it was for Donjon IIRC) and upgrade NH if possible.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.

comment.author: leemhenson
